about_the_game:
Steamers:
Hello,I'm spook, a indie game developer from Art9 Indie Studio.I'm a fever game player since I was a kid,so always dream about making a game.
I'm was one of war3 rpg map maker, who made a series named The Light March at U9 website in China for years...I'm a experienced game designer by now.
And,this is my first time to publish game on Steam.I have spent so many years on this project in part time, almostly by myself,that's real a challenge and meaningful thing for my life.

About this game:

*This is delicate little game,you can easily run it quick and good on the target platorm.
*With cyberpunk design concept and background story,you played as a scientist of computer security,to eliminate the super PC virus which made by a famous hacker.
*it's also a casual game about computer knowledges, there are twelves different levels, and you role without HP system,which means only some chances to resurrect, and therefore with exciting challenge, a good gameplay skill will be cool.
*There are three bosses inside challenge,every level has two difficulty mode,that connect with game achievement and statistics.
*There is shop,item,resources in level,idle play,and battle game element, these elements are designed to increase gameplay.
*Play with some interesting netas(may be only for bilibili user,chinese)

As I'm in charge of every crazy things and limited by conditions, after so many test and bug fix,there may some unpredictable bugs still out there,If your come across with any bug, first, try to restart to see if come again or not, or contact us for late update.

Thanks,
Best wishes!
detailed_description:
Steamers:
Hello,I'm spook, a indie game developer from Art9 Indie Studio.I'm a fever game player since I was a kid,so always dream about making a game.
I'm was one of war3 rpg map maker, who made a series named The Light March at U9 website in China for years...I'm a experienced game designer by now.
And,this is my first time to publish game on Steam.I have spent so many years on this project in part time, almostly by myself,that's real a challenge and meaningful thing for my life.

About this game:

*This is delicate little game,you can easily run it quick and good on the target platorm.
*With cyberpunk design concept and background story,you played as a scientist of computer security,to eliminate the super PC virus which made by a famous hacker.
*it's also a casual game about computer knowledges, there are twelves different levels, and you role without HP system,which means only some chances to resurrect, and therefore with exciting challenge, a good gameplay skill will be cool.
*There are three bosses inside challenge,every level has two difficulty mode,that connect with game achievement and statistics.
*There is shop,item,resources in level,idle play,and battle game element, these elements are designed to increase gameplay.
*Play with some interesting netas(may be only for bilibili user,chinese)

As I'm in charge of every crazy things and limited by conditions, after so many test and bug fix,there may some unpredictable bugs still out there,If your come across with any bug, first, try to restart to see if come again or not, or contact us for late update.

Thanks,
Best wishes!
name: Cyber Virus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel I3 or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel I5 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GTX 960 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a casual rpg game, there are twelve levels from different challenges. You control the main role, with a little bit delicate play skill,to eliminate enemies.You can collect resources inside game to buy items and enhance your role...like a RPG,anyway.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
